name: Chris Kanich
content: Chris Kanich · Homepage Chris Kanich I am a Professor at the University of Illinois Chicago in the Department of Computer Science. As of Fall 2025, I also serve as the College of Engineering Associate Dean for Faculty Affairs. From Fall 2022 to Fall 2025, I served as the Director of Undergraduate Studies. Contact information: in person: room 4411 CDRLC Fall 2025 office hours: 3:30-4:30 Mondays and Tuesdays. snail mail: University of Illinois at Chicago Dept. Computer Science 850 W Taylor St. 4411 CDRLC (M/C 152) Chicago, IL 60607 email: ckanich@uic.edu phone: 312-355-0950 (email is vastly preferred) bluesky: @kaytwo.org github: @kaytwo YouTube: chriskanich TikTok: @ProfessorKanich What I look like Research interests I conduct data-driven research on the socio-technical aspects of cybersecurity. This research includes characterizing the shifting long-term privacy needs of Internet users, better understanding the extent to which deep learning threatens user security and privacy on the web, as well as the practical impact of security-centric tools like Single Sign-On and VPNs for users and non-users alike. I am very interested in new collaborations, motivated students, and lively conversation regarding security research - please reach out via email or twitter if youâd like to chat!
